personal.name: Ashley Chan
personal.title: Computer Science Student
personal.bio: A passionate computer science student who loves blending creativity with code. I build digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional, always with a touch of playfulness and innovation.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: Server-side rendering and static site generation

projects.title: taleQ
projects.description: An AI-powered talent acquisition system designed to streamline resume screening and HR workflow.

projects.title: CharityChain
projects.description: A decentralized charity platform powered by Web3 technology. Charity Chain enables anyone to donate or request aid transparently using cryptocurrency.

projects.title: commentsense
projects.description: This project provides a web-based analytics dashboard designed to measure the true quality of audience engagement on social media content.

projects.title: smartboss
projects.description: An intelligent corporate solution that helps startups and companies simulate and predict the outcomes of new business initiatives using AI.

hobbies.name: Gaming
hobbies.description: Love playing indie games and RPGs, especially titles with unique storytelling and beautiful pixel art.

hobbies.name: Digital Art
hobbies.description: Creating whimsical illustrations and character designs, often inspired by space themes and cute aesthetics.

hobbies.name: Music
hobbies.description: Playing piano and discovering new indie artists, particularly drawn to lo-fi and ambient electronic music.

hobbies.name: Cooking
hobbies.description: Experimenting with Korean and fusion recipes, always trying to make meals as colorful as my code!

hobbies.name: Stargazing
hobbies.description: Finding peace under the night sky and learning about constellations - it inspires my cosmic-themed projects.

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: Diving into sci-fi novels and tech blogs, always curious about future possibilities and emerging technologies.

meta.title: Ashley's World - Creative Developer Portfolio
meta.description: Ashley Chan - Computer Science student passionate about blending creativity with code. Explore my cosmic-themed portfolio featuring interactive projects and beautiful designs.

tools.name: Bolt
tools.description: The foundation builder that created the base structure of this website. Bolt provided the initial scaffolding and core components.

tools.name: ChatGPT
tools.description: The creative prompt generator that helped brainstorm ideas and create detailed prompts for other AI tools in the development process.

tools.name: Warp
tools.description: The refinement specialist used for polishing code, fixing bugs, and making incremental improvements throughout development.

tools.name: Gemini CLI
tools.description: The feature architect that transformed prompts into new functionality and refined existing features with precision.

tools.name: Pinterest
tools.description: The inspiration curator that provided endless UI design ideas, color palettes, and creative direction for the visual aesthetic.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: The collaboration hub for version control, code storage, and tracking the evolution of this portfolio project.

tools.name: Vercel
tools.description: The deployment platform that brings this portfolio to life on the web with seamless hosting and continuous deployment.

back.title: The Curious Mind
back.description: My personality type is INTP ‚Äî curious, imaginative, and always exploring new ideas. I love diving deep into complex problems and finding creative solutions.

back.title: Dream Architect
back.description: I can sleep anywhere, anytime. My friends joke that I have a PhD in napping. Some of my best coding ideas actually come from dreams!

back.title: Poyo! üíñ
back.description: Kirby represents everything I love: cute, powerful, and endlessly adaptable. Plus, who doesn't want to absorb skills by eating things?

back.title: Midnight Magic
back.description: My brain works best when the world is quiet. There's something magical about coding under the stars with lo-fi music playing.

back.title: Hidden Gems Collector
back.description: I love discovering indie games with unique mechanics and beautiful pixel art. Currently obsessed with cozy farming sims and puzzle platformers.

back.title: Universe Explorer
back.description: The night sky fills me with wonder and inspiration. I love learning about constellations and imagining what's out there among the stars.
